case.title: I need somebody special, I'll make you very happy. BRITISH ONLY - 27
case.text:
Hi I am 27 years old, very good looking, tall blond with light eyes and slim. I would like to meet someone special that can enter in my life. I need you to be genuine, simple, loyal and reliable, last but not least the aspect is a little important aswell for me. I am easygoing, comprehensive, well educated and hilarious. Please drop me a line and see if we click, cause if it will be I'll make your day everyday!
If you need any pictures of me, I'll send you.
Hope to find you!
